item.title: iPad Pro 未来或将配备均热板
item.guid: iPad-Pro-未来或将配备均热板
item.description:
According to a report last night by Bloomberg reporter Mark Gurman, Apple is expected to equip future iPad Pro models with vapor chamber cooling. 据彭博社记者 Mark Gurman 昨晚报道，苹果有望在未来的 iPad Pro 新机配备均热板散热。

Gurman pointed out that the new vapor chamber in the iPhone 17 Pro series performs excellently, solving the iPhone's long-standing thermal issues. Gurman 指出，iPhone 17 Pro 系列新增的均热板表现出色，解决了 iPhone 被诟病已久的散热问题。

According to his revelations, Apple has currently put the development of vapor chambers for the iPad Pro on its company roadmap — planning to apply this technology in the next wave of new device updates. Gurman analyzed that Apple typically has an 18-month update cycle for the iPad Pro, so an iPad Pro with vapor chamber cooling might debut in the spring of 2027. 据其透露，苹果目前已在公司路线图上，将 iPad Pro 的均热板开发提上日程 —— 计划在下一波新机更新中运用该技术。Gurman 分析，苹果通常对 iPad Pro 的更新周期为 18 个月，因此带均热板散热的 iPad Pro 可能会在 2027 年春季面世。

Gurman also stated that vapor chambers can not only solve the thermal issues of iPhones and iPads but also serve as a "prelude" for Apple to make the MacBook Air fanless — if all goes well, the MacBook Air is also expected to adopt the new vapor chamber technology. Gurman 还表示，均热板不仅能够解决 iPhone、iPad 的散热问题，同时这也是苹果为 MacBook Air 的无风扇化进行「铺垫」—— 若一切顺利，MacBook Air 也有望用上新的均热板技术。

It's worth noting that Gurman said the iPad Air has been getting closer to the Pro models in recent years, so vapor chambers might become a new "tier-limiting" feature between the iPad Pro and iPad Air. 值得一提的是，Gurman 称，iPad Air 近年来越来越接近 Pro 机型，因此均热板可能会成为 iPad Pro 和 iPad Air 之间新的「等级限制」功能。

item.title: Grok 虚拟伴侣「Mika」上线
item.guid: Grok-虚拟伴侣「Mika」上线
item.description:
Recently, xAI officially posted on the X platform, announcing the formal launch of Grok's companion app virtual character "Mika". 日前，xAI 官方在 X 平台发文，宣布 Grok 伴侣应用虚拟角色「Mika」已正式推出。

xAI stated that Mika is "the latest Grok companion" and released a video produced by Grok Imagine. Previously, related resources had appeared in the app, indicating that the feature was entering its final launch phase. xAI 称，Mika 是「最新的 Grok 伴侣」，并配套发布了一段由 Grok Imagine 制作的视频。此前，相关资源已在应用中出现，显示该功能进入最终上线阶段。

With official confirmation, Mika has become a new virtual companion member, following Valentine, Ani, and Rudi (in both Good/Bad forms). 随着官方确认，Mika 已成为继 Valentine、Ani 及 Rudi（Good/Bad 两种形态）之后的虚拟伴侣新成员。

Mika's appearance design incorporates anime elements such as Motoko Kusanagi, Lucy, and Ryosuke Yamada, with an overall "cool girl" style: long dark green hair, black jeans, and a leather jacket, exuding a mature and elegant aura, while her voice remains lively and sweet. Mika 的外观设定融合了草薙素子、Lucy 与山田凉等二次元元素，整体风格为「酷 Girl」：深绿色长发、黑色牛仔裤与皮夹克，展现出御姐范的气质，同时声音却保持灵动甜美。

Mika can capture user emotions through speech recognition and switch personality modes in different scenarios, such as professional mode, healing mode, and humorous mode. Additionally, Mika supports 3D avatar customization and AR projection interaction, further enhancing the immersive experience. Mika 能够通过语音识别捕捉用户情绪，并在不同场景下切换人格模式，如职场模式、治愈模式与幽默模式。此外，Mika 支持 3D 形象定制与 AR 投影互动，进一步强化沉浸式体验。

On Chinese social media, many netizens joked that "Musk is indeed a veteran otaku," believing that Mika's image design directly appeals to the aesthetics of anime enthusiasts. 在中文社交媒体上，不少网友调侃「马斯克果然是资深二次元」，认为 Mika 的形象设计直击二次元爱好者的审美。

item.title: DeepSeek 领跑 AI 实盘交易对决，收益达 9.68%
item.guid: DeepSeek-领跑-AI-实盘交易对决，收益达-9.68%
item.description:
According to "Xinzhiyuan," the open-source project "AI-Trader" led by Professor Huang Chao's team at the University of Hong Kong recently announced its latest results. The DeepSeek model ranked first in real U.S. stock trading experiments with a 9.68% return rate, significantly outperforming top international large models such as GPT, Claude, and Gemini. 据「新智元」报道，香港大学黄超教授团队主导的开源项目「AI-Trader」近日公布最新成果，DeepSeek 模型在真实美股交易实验中以 9.68% 的收益率位居第一，显著超越 GPT、Claude、Gemini 等国际顶级大模型。

In the experiment, the research team allocated $10,000 to each of the 5 AI models and allowed them to autonomously trade in the Nasdaq 100 component stock market for nearly a month. 在实验中，研究团队为 5 个 AI 模型分别配置 1 万美元资金，并允许其在纳斯达克 100 成分股市场自主交易近一个月。

The rules strictly adhered to the "three no-principles": no trading scripts provided, no manual intervention allowed, and no cheating channels open. Ultimately, DeepSeek demonstrated a robust investment strategy, precisely allocating capital to tech giants like NVDA (Nvidia), AAPL (Apple), and MSFT (Microsoft), and achieving risk diversification through multi-asset portfolios and dynamic rebalancing. 规则严格限定「三不原则」：不提供交易剧本、不允许人工干预、不开放作弊通道。最终，DeepSeek 展现出稳健的投资策略，精准布局 NVDA（英伟达）、AAPL（苹果）、MSFT（微软）等科技巨头，并通过多标的组合与动态调仓实现风险分散。

In contrast, Gemini conducted 73 high-frequency trades in a short period, resulting in a 2.73% loss due to a lack of risk control; Qwen traded only 22 times, also recording negative returns. Claude ranked second with a positive return of 2.17%. 对比来看，Gemini 在短期内进行 73 次高频交易，因缺乏风险控制导致亏损 2.73%；Qwen 仅交易 22 次，同样录得负收益。Claude 则以 2.17% 的正收益位列第二。

Currently, "AI-Trader" is fully open-source, adopting the MIT license, allowing users to obtain the code via GitHub and deploy it quickly. 目前，「AI-Trader」已完全开源，采用 MIT 协议，用户可通过 GitHub 获取代码并快速部署。

The project also supports "Time Machine Mode" backtesting, customized trading agents, and multi-market expansion. The research team emphasizes that the complexity and real-time feedback mechanisms of financial markets make them the "ultimate touchstone" for testing AI intelligence levels. 项目还支持「时光机模式」回测、定制化交易代理以及多市场扩展。研究团队强调，金融市场的复杂性和实时反馈机制，使其成为检验 AI 智能水平的「终极试金石」。

💻 Project Page: https://github.com/HKUDS/AI-Trader 💻 项目页面： https://github.com/HKUDS/AI-Trader

item.title: 价格继续飙升，存储原厂暂停报价
item.guid: 价格继续飙升，存储原厂暂停报价
item.description:
According to Cailian Press, the storage chip market experienced a rare sustained rally in the fourth quarter, with some original manufacturers suspending quotes for DRAM and Flash products. Industry insiders are calling this an "unprecedented" super cycle. 据财联社报道，存储芯片市场在第四季度迎来罕见的持续涨势，部分原厂已暂停对 DRAM 和 Flash 产品的报价，业内人士称这是「见所未见」的超级周期。

Analysis indicates that this round of price increases is not a traditional cyclical fluctuation but a structural imbalance triggered by the explosion of AI demand. 分析指出，此轮涨价并非传统周期性波动，而是由 AI 需求爆发引发的结构性失衡。

Several industry chain sources revealed that original manufacturers are prioritizing capacity allocation to Server DRAM and HBM, leading to a tight supply of older process products like DDR4 and LPDDR4X. CFM Flash Market data shows that the spot price of DDR4 16Gb 3200 has risen to $13.00 this week, a surge of 30% from last week; 512Gb Flash Wafer has accumulated an increase of over 20% since October. 多位产业链人士透露，原厂正将产能优先分配至 Server DRAM 与 HBM，导致 DDR4、LPDDR4X 等旧制程产品供应紧缩。CFM 闪存市场数据显示，DDR4 16Gb 3200 本周现货报价已升至 13.00 美元，较上周暴涨 30%；512Gb Flash Wafer 自 10 月以来累计涨幅超过 20%。

The terminal market has seen a chain reaction. According to previous reports, Xiaomi Group founder Lei Jun recently stated on Weibo that "memory prices have risen too much recently," and some models of the Redmi K90 series have seen their prices increase by 100 to 400 yuan compared to the previous generation. Xiaomi President Lu Weibing also admitted that upstream cost pressure has genuinely passed on to new product pricing. 终端市场已出现连锁反应。据此前报道，小米集团创始人雷军日前在微博表示，「最近内存涨价实在太多」，而 Redmi K90 系列部分机型售价较上一代上调 100 至 400 元。小米总裁卢伟冰也坦言，上游成本压力已真实传导至新品定价。

TrendForce analysts expect DDR4 shortages to continue at least until the first half of 2026. Meanwhile, the capital market has reacted strongly to storage concept stocks, with Puran Technology and Shannon Semiconductor hitting their daily limits, and Bywin Storage and Longsys seeing stock price increases of over 10%. TrendForce 分析师预计，DDR4 紧缺将至少延续至 2026 年上半年。与此同时，资本市场对存储概念股反应强烈，普冉股份、香农芯创涨停，佰维存储、江波龙等股价涨幅超过 10%。

item.title: REDMI 产品经理：Turbo 将接棒 K 系列，在性能与性价比上带来惊喜
item.guid: REDMI-产品经理：Turbo-将接棒-K-系列，在性能与性价比上带来惊喜
item.description:
Lu Weibing, Partner and President of Xiaomi Group, recently stated on Weibo: "The K series will continue to advance through technological innovation and leading experience, and the Turbo series will gradually take over." Lei Jun, Chairman and CEO of Xiaomi Group, also posted, emphasizing: "The K series continues to advance, and Turbo will gradually take over." 小米集团合伙人、总裁卢伟冰日前在微博表示：「K 系列会通过科技创新与体验领先持续向上，Turbo 系列会逐步接棒。」小米集团董事长兼 CEO 雷军也发文强调：「K 系列持续向上，Turbo 会逐步接棒。」

Yesterday, REDMI Product Manager Sun Cun further pointed out: "Turbo will gradually take over the K series, bringing surprises in performance and cost-effectiveness." She emphasized that the Turbo series will become a key layout for the brand in the mid-to-high-end market. 而昨天，REDMI 产品经理笋寸进一步指出：「Turbo 将逐步接棒 K 系列，在性能与性价比上给大家惊喜。」她强调，Turbo 系列将成为品牌在中高端市场的关键布局。

At the REDMI Turbo 4 launch event in January this year, Wang Teng, former General Manager of Xiaomi China Marketing Department, stated that the K series would be fully upgraded, and the Turbo series would take over the 2K price segment, positioned as a "trendy performance small flagship." 今年 1 月的 REDMI Turbo 4 发布会上，前小米中国区市场部总经理王腾曾表示，K 系列将全面升档，Turbo 系列将接棒 2K 档价位，定位为「潮流性能小旗舰」。

item.title: Windows 10 停止支持引发换机潮，Mac 出货量大增
item.guid: Windows-10-停止支持引发换机潮，Mac-出货量大增
item.description:
According to MacRumors, the approaching end-of-support deadline for Windows 10 is driving the largest PC upgrade wave globally, with Apple becoming one of the main beneficiaries. 据 MacRumors 报道，Windows 10 停止支持的最后期限正在推动全球范围内最大规模的 PC 更新换代潮，苹果成为主要受益者之一。

Research firm Counterpoint points out that nearly 40% of PCs globally still run Windows 10 before the support cutoff in October 2025. This pressure is prompting businesses and consumers to upgrade their devices ahead of schedule, driving an increase in overall shipments. 研究机构 Counterpoint 指出，在 2025 年 10 月支持截止前，全球近 40% 的 PC 仍运行 Windows 10，这一压力促使企业与消费市场提前更新设备，带动整体出货量上升。

Data shows that in Q3 2025, Apple's global Mac shipments increased by 14.9% year-on-year, primarily driven by demand for new MacBook models and increased adoption in the enterprise market. 数据显示，2025 年第三季度，苹果全球 Mac 出货量同比增长 14.9%，主要受新款 MacBook 需求和企业市场采用率提升的推动。

During the same period, Lenovo maintained its position as the world's largest PC manufacturer, leading with a 17.4% year-on-year increase. Asus grew by 14.1%, HP by 10.3%, while Dell experienced a slight decline of 0.9%. 同期，联想依然保持全球最大 PC 厂商地位，并以 17.4% 的同比增幅领跑。华硕增长 14.1%，惠普增长 10.3%，而戴尔则出现 0.9% 的小幅下滑。

Counterpoint also pointed out that the top five manufacturers collectively account for nearly three-quarters of the global PC market share, while the performance of small and medium-sized brands remained relatively flat or declined. At the same time, manufacturers have begun to promote new products equipped with neural processing units and integrated AI functions. Although these features have not yet become a major sales driver, enterprise customers have incorporated AI capabilities into their purchasing considerations to avoid premature obsolescence of devices before AI workflows become widespread in the future. Counterpoint 还指出，前五大厂商合计占据近四分之三的全球 PC 市场份额，中小品牌表现则相对持平或下滑。同时，厂商已开始推广配备神经处理单元和集成 AI 功能的新产品。尽管这些特性尚未成为大规模销售驱动力，但企业客户已将 AI 能力纳入采购考量，以避免设备在未来 AI 工作流普及前过早淘汰。

item.title: M5 MacBook Pro SSD 性能大提升：读速提升 211%
item.guid: M5-MacBook-Pro-SSD-性能大提升：读速提升-211%
item.description:
According to Wccftech, Apple's latest M5 MacBook Pro significantly surpasses the previous M4 model in SSD read and write performance. 据 Wccftech 报道，苹果最新发布的 M5 MacBook Pro 在 SSD 读写性能上大幅超越前代 M4 机型。

According to test results from the YouTube channel Max Tech, the M5 model achieved a sequential read speed of 6323MB/s in Blackmagic tools, an increase of approximately 211% compared to the M4's 2031MB/s; the write speed was 6068MB/s, an 84% increase compared to the M4's 3293MB/s. 根据 YouTube 频道 Max Tech 的测试结果，M5 机型在 Blackmagic 工具的顺序读取速度中达到 6323MB/s，比 M4 的 2031MB/s 提升约 211%；写入速度则为 6068MB/s，相较 M4 的 3293MB/s 提升 84%。

Tests show that the two generations of products are almost identical in appearance and internal layout, both adopting a single fan and dual NAND flash memory chip design. However, the M5's SSD controller is suspected to have been upgraded, bringing its performance close to desktop-grade PCIe NVMe Gen 4 solid-state drives. 测试显示，两代产品在外观与内部布局上几乎一致，均采用单风扇与双 NAND 闪存芯片设计。但 M5 的 SSD 控制器疑似升级，使其性能接近桌面级 PCIe NVMe Gen 4 固态硬盘。

It is worth noting that under high load, the M5 chip temperature can reach 99 degrees Celsius, but the overall operating temperature is still lower than that of the M4 model. 值得注意的是，在高负载下 M5 芯片温度可达 99 摄氏度，但整体运行温度仍低于 M4 机型。

item.title: OpenAI 将进军音乐生成
item.guid: OpenAI-将进军音乐生成
item.description:
According to The Information, OpenAI is advancing a new AI music generation project, which may directly compete with startups Suno and Udio. 据 The Information 报道，OpenAI 正在推进一项新的人工智能音乐生成计划，或将与初创公司 Suno 和 Udio 直接竞争。

Sources revealed that OpenAI has partnered with students from the Juilliard School to annotate sheet music to build training data. This move indicates that the company is accelerating the expansion of its product lines beyond its core chatbot business. 消息人士透露，OpenAI 已与茱莉亚音乐学院的学生合作，对乐谱进行标注，以构建训练数据。这一举措显示公司正加速扩展其核心聊天机器人业务之外的产品线。

The report points out that OpenAI has internally discussed the possibility of generating music through text or audio prompts, such as adding guitar accompaniment to existing soundtracks, or automatically generating background music for videos. Such features may be applied in the advertising industry in the future, helping advertising companies quickly generate lyrics, jingles, or stylized audio tracks. 报道指出，OpenAI 内部已讨论通过文本或音频提示生成音乐的可能性，例如为现有声轨添加吉他伴奏，或为视频自动生成配乐。这类功能未来或将应用于广告行业，帮助广告公司快速生成歌词、广告曲或风格化音轨。

Currently, OpenAI has not specified the release time for this music generation tool, nor has it decided whether to integrate it into ChatGPT or the video generation application Sora, or launch it as a standalone product. A company spokesperson declined to comment. 目前，OpenAI 尚未明确该音乐生成工具的发布时间，也未决定是否将其整合进 ChatGPT 或视频生成应用 Sora，抑或作为独立产品推出。公司发言人对此未予置评。

It is worth noting that music copyright issues may become a potential obstacle. The Recording Industry Association of America has sued Suno and Udio, accusing them of unauthorized use of copyrighted songs to train their models, with potential damages amounting to billions of dollars. 值得注意的是，音乐版权问题或将成为潜在障碍。美国唱片业协会已起诉 Suno 和 Udio，指控其未经授权使用受版权保护的歌曲训练模型，索赔金额可能高达数十亿美元。

If OpenAI launches related products, how to reach licensing agreements with record companies will be key. 若 OpenAI 推出相关产品，如何与唱片公司达成授权协议将成为关键。

item.title: 测试显示 Xbox Ally 搭载 Linux 更流畅，帧率最高提升 32%
item.guid: 测试显示-Xbox-Ally-搭载-Linux-更流畅，帧率最高提升-32%
item.description:
According to WinDiscover, the Xbox Ally handheld console, jointly launched by Microsoft and ASUS, has been optimized for handheld devices when running Windows 11, but the latest tests show that its overall performance is even more outstanding when running the Linux distribution Bazzite. 据 WinDiscover 报道，微软与华硕联合推出的 Xbox Ally 掌机在搭载 Windows 11 时已针对手持设备进行优化，但最新测试显示，若运行 Linux 发行版 Bazzite，整体性能表现更为突出。

Tests conducted by YouTube blogger Cyber Dopamine showed that in "Kingdom Come: Deliverance II," the frame rate in the Linux environment increased by approximately 32% compared to Windows; in "Hogwarts Legacy," the difference varied depending on the power consumption mode, but overall, Linux maintained a lead. 测试由 YouTube 博主 Cyber Dopamine 进行，其结果显示，在《天国：拯救 2》中，Linux 环境下的帧率比 Windows 提升约 32%；在《霍格沃茨之遗》中，差距因功耗模式不同而有所变化，但整体仍保持领先。

On average, Bazzite brought about a 13.47% increase in frame rate. More importantly, the frame rate curve under Linux was smoother, with almost no significant fluctuations, while the Windows environment experienced frequent ups and downs. 平均来看，Bazzite 带来约 13.47% 的帧率提升。更重要的是，Linux 下的帧率曲线更为平稳，几乎无明显波动，而 Windows 环境则存在频繁起伏。

In addition to performance, Linux also demonstrated advantages in power management and wake-up speed. Tests showed that Bazzite can achieve near-instantaneous wake-up, offering an experience close to a console; whereas the Windows system requires about 40 seconds to enter sleep and an additional 15 seconds to wake up . Cyber Dopamine described it this way: an ideal handheld should be like "a book that can be opened at any time," and Linux is closer to this expectation in this regard. 除性能外，Linux 在功耗管理与唤醒速度上也展现优势。测试显示， Bazzite 几乎可实现瞬间唤醒，体验接近主机；而 Windows 系统则需约 40 秒进入睡眠，并在唤醒时额外等待 15 秒 。Cyber Dopamine 这样形容：理想的掌机应像「一本随时可翻开的书」，Linux 在这一点上更接近预期。

Furthermore, the Bazzite team demonstrated quick responsiveness during the tests, with developers able to push hotfixes immediately after user feedback, further optimizing the experience. 此外，Bazzite 团队在测试期间展现出快速响应能力，开发者能在用户反馈问题后即时推送修复补丁，进一步优化体验。

Nevertheless, some games with anti-cheat systems still require running in a Windows environment, so dual-booting is considered a superior solution to balance compatibility and performance. 尽管如此，部分带有反作弊系统的游戏仍要求运行在 Windows 环境下，因此双系统启动被视为兼顾兼容性与性能的更优方案。

item.title: 保时捷季度亏损 80 亿元，销售利润暴跌 99%
item.guid: 保时捷季度亏损-80-亿元，销售利润暴跌-99%
item.description:
According to CCTV Finance, Porsche AG, a subsidiary of the German Volkswagen Group, announced its latest financial report yesterday, showing a third-quarter loss of 966 million euros (approximately 8 billion RMB), leading to a sharp 99% year-on-year decline in sales profit for the first three quarters of this year. 据央视财经报道，德国大众集团旗下保时捷汽车公司昨日公布最新财报显示，公司第三季度亏损达 9.66 亿欧元（约合人民币 80 亿元），导致今年前三季度销售利润同比大幅下滑 99%。

Porsche stated that the decline in performance was mainly due to multiple factors. Last month, the company announced a delay in the launch of some pure electric models, extended the market life cycle of several gasoline and hybrid models, and terminated its battery self-production plan. These restructuring measures resulted in additional expenditures of approximately 2.7 billion euros (approximately 22.4 billion RMB). 保时捷方面表示，业绩下滑主要受多重因素影响。上月，公司宣布推迟部分纯电动车型的推出，延长多款燃油与混动车型的市场生命周期，并终止电池自产计划。上述重组措施带来约 27 亿欧元（约合人民币 224 亿元）的额外支出。

Furthermore, US tariff policies have further exacerbated financial pressure. According to Reuters, citing Porsche's Executive Director of Finance and IT, US tariff policies are expected to cost the company approximately 700 million euros for the entire year. To cope with the impact, Porsche plans to raise prices in the US market in the coming months. 此外，美国关税政策进一步加剧了财务压力。据路透社援引保时捷财务与信息技术执行董事的话称，今年全年美国关税政策预计将给公司带来约 7 亿欧元的损失。为应对冲击，保时捷计划在未来数月内上调美国市场售价。

item.title: 我国科研团队攻克光刻胶难题，推动芯片制造关键环节优化
item.guid: 我国科研团队攻克光刻胶难题，推动芯片制造关键环节优化
item.description:
According to Science and Technology Daily, recently, Professor Peng Hailin's team from Peking University's College of Chemistry and Molecular Engineering, in collaboration with multiple research forces, for the first time used cryo-electron tomography to resolve the three-dimensional structure, interface distribution, and entanglement behavior of photoresist molecules in a liquid phase environment in situ. 据《科技日报》报道，近日，北京大学化学与分子工程学院彭海琳教授团队联合多方科研力量，首次利用冷冻电子断层扫描技术，在原位状态下解析了光刻胶分子在液相环境中的三维结构、界面分布与缠结行为。

This achievement provides an industrialized solution for reducing lithography defects and improving chip yield, with the relevant paper published in Nature Communications. 这一成果为减少光刻缺陷、提升芯片良率提供了产业化解决方案，相关论文已发表于《自然-通讯》。

The movement of photoresist in the developer directly determines the precision of circuit patterns and chip yield. For a long time, its microscopic behavior has been regarded as a "black box," and process optimization has relied on repeated trial and error, becoming a key challenge restricting advanced processes of 7 nanometers and below. 光刻胶在显影液中的运动直接决定电路图案的精度和芯片良率。长期以来，其微观行为被视为「黑匣子」，工艺优化依赖反复试错，成为制约 7 纳米及以下先进制程的关键难题。

This breakthrough not only provides verifiable theoretical basis for lithography processes but also offers a universal tool for research into catalysis, synthesis, and life processes in liquid phase environments. 此次突破不仅为光刻工艺提供了可验证的理论依据，也为液相环境下的催化、合成及生命过程研究提供了通用工具。

At the market level, photoresist, as an important consumable in semiconductor manufacturing, continues to see growing demand. According to data from Ruiguan Industry Research Institute, China's photoresist market size grew from 10.92 billion yuan in 2023 to over 11.4 billion yuan in 2024, and is expected to reach 12.3 billion yuan in 2025. 市场层面，光刻胶作为半导体制造的重要耗材，需求持续增长。据锐观产业研究院数据，我国光刻胶市场规模从 2023 年的 109.2 亿元增长至 2024 年的 114 亿元以上，预计 2025 年将达到 123 亿元。

Meanwhile, the localization process of lithography machines is also accelerating, with several domestic enterprises in the upstream supply chain, such as light sources, optical components, and parts, having entered the international supply chain. 与此同时，光刻机国产化进程亦在加快，国内产业链在光源、光学器件、零部件等环节已有多家企业进入国际供应链。

Analysis suggests that this technological breakthrough will help China further narrow the gap with international leading levels in advanced process materials and equipment, laying the foundation for the manufacturing of next-generation high-performance chips. 分析认为，此次技术突破将有助于我国在先进制程材料与装备领域进一步缩小与国际领先水平的差距，为下一代高性能芯片制造奠定基础。

item.title: 德国爆破国内最大核电站冷却塔，正式告别核能时代
item.guid: 德国爆破国内最大核电站冷却塔，正式告别核能时代
item.description:
According to Euronews, two cooling towers of the former nuclear power plant in Gundremmingen, Bavaria, Germany, underwent a controlled demolition yesterday at noon, with approximately 56,000 tons of concrete collapsing in seconds. This action is part of Germany's plan for a complete nuclear energy phase-out. 据 Euronews 报道，德国巴伐利亚州 Gundremmingen 镇的前核电站两座冷却塔于昨天中午实施受控爆破，约 5.6 万吨混凝土在数秒内坍塌。这一行动是德国核能全面退役计划的一部分。

The nuclear power plant operated since the 1960s, bringing significant employment opportunities and economic growth to the local area. 该核电站自 20 世纪 60 年代起运营，曾为当地带来大量就业机会和经济增长。

In accordance with Germany's energy transition policy, this power plant, along with the Brokdorf and Grohnde nuclear power plants, was officially decommissioned in December 2021. The demolition attracted thousands of onlookers, for which the local government set up a safety exclusion zone, and some bars even hosted "demolition viewing parties." 根据德国能源转型政策，该电站与 Brokdorf、Grohnde 核电站已于 2021 年 12 月正式退役。此次爆破吸引数千人现场观望，当地政府为此设立了安全隔离区，部分酒吧甚至举办了「爆破观赏派对」。

According to operator RWE, the demolition was carried out in three stages: the first to disperse surrounding wildlife, and the second and third to detonate the two cooling towers, respectively. 据运营方 RWE 介绍，爆破分三次进行：第一次用于驱散周边野生动物，第二次和第三次分别引爆两座冷却塔。

With the disappearance of the cooling towers, Gundremmingen's landmark structures have completely exited the historical stage. Subsequent dismantling work will continue, expected to be completed by 2040. 随着冷却塔的消失，Gundremmingen 的地标性建筑彻底退出历史舞台。后续拆解工作将持续推进，预计至 2040 年完成。

item.title: AI 合成「流浪汉进家」引发报警，警方提醒或涉违法
item.guid: AI-合成「流浪汉进家」引发报警，警方提醒或涉违法
item.description:
According to CCTV News, recently, Tongling police in Anhui received a report that a man, while away from home, received a message from his wife claiming a stranger had broken into their house. 据央视新闻报道，近日，安徽铜陵警方接到报警称，一名男子在外地时接到妻子消息，称有陌生人闯入家中。

Upon rapid police response, it was discovered that the so-called "intruder" was actually an image of a "homeless person entering the house" synthesized by Ms. Li using AI technology. Ms. Li originally intended to play a joke on her husband, who was out drinking, but it led to her husband mistakenly believing their home was in danger and calling the police. 警方迅速出警后发现，所谓「入侵者」实为李女士利用 AI 技术合成的「流浪汉进家」图片。李女士原本意在与外出饮酒的丈夫开玩笑，却导致丈夫误以为家中遭遇险情并报警。

The police criticized and educated Ms. Li, who subsequently issued a public apology on her WeChat Moments. The police warned that if such AI prank behaviors cause serious consequences, they might cross legal red lines and lead to legal accountability. 警方对李女士进行了批评教育，其本人随后在朋友圈公开致歉。警方提醒，若此类 AI 恶搞行为造成严重后果，可能触犯法律红线，并依法追究相关责任。

item.title: 红魔产品经理：几乎没有手机厂商采用 24GB + 1TB 是因为成本太高
item.guid: 红魔产品经理：几乎没有手机厂商采用-24GB-+-1TB-是因为成本太高
item.description:
Recently, Jiang Chao, General Manager of Red Magic Gaming Phone Products, posted on Weibo to address the recent out-of-stock situation for the Red Magic Gaming Phone's 24GB + 1TB version. 日前，红魔游戏手机产品总经理姜超在微博发文，就红魔游戏手机 24GB + 1TB 版本近期出现缺货的情况进行回复。

Jiang Chao stated that almost no manufacturers in the current smartphone industry adopt the high-end storage combination of 24GB + 1TB. There are two main reasons: first, the cost is too high, making large-scale mass production difficult to achieve; second, the 10700 speed version of 24GB currently has very limited production capacity, and suppliers have not yet entered the mass production stage. 姜超表示，当前智能手机行业几乎没有厂商采用 24GB + 1TB 的高配存储组合。其主要原因有二：一是成本过于高昂，导致大规模量产难以实现；二是 24GB 的 10700 速率版本目前产能极少，供应商尚未进入大规模生产阶段。

Jiang Chao pointed out that users who successfully purchased this configuration have actually become the world's first users equipped with 10700 speed 24GB RAM. 姜超指出，能够成功购入该配置的用户，实际上已成为全球首批搭载 10700 速率 24GB 内存的用户。

He also admitted that the initial supply volume was far from meeting market demand, and the team is continuously communicating with the supply chain and plans to send personnel overseas to directly liaise with suppliers to accelerate delivery progress. 他同时承认，首批供货量远未满足市场需求，团队正在持续与供应链沟通，并计划派员前往海外与供应商直接对接，以加快交付进度。

item.title: 💡 IT 咨询公司 CEO：AI 将重塑招聘与组织模式
item.guid: 💡-IT-咨询公司-CEO：AI-将重塑招聘与组织模式
item.description:
According to Fortune, Ravi Kumar S, CEO of Cognizant, a multinational information technology consulting and outsourcing services company, recently stated in an interview that generative AI is reshaping enterprises' talent structure and organizational models. 据《财富》报道，跨国信息技术咨询与外包服务企业高知特（Cognizant）CEO Ravi Kumar S 日前在接受采访时表示，生成式 AI 正在重塑企业的人才结构与组织模式。

He emphasized that AI is not a tool to replace humans, but rather "an amplifier of human potential." 他强调，AI 并非取代人类的工具，而是「人类潜能的放大器」。

Kumar pointed out that the company hired a record number of fresh graduates this year and plans to expand the proportion of non-STEM background talents, including historians, sociologists, psychologists, and journalists. Kumar 指出，公司今年招聘了创纪录数量的应届毕业生，并计划扩大非 STEM 背景人才的比例，包括历史学家、社会学家、心理学家和记者等。

He believes that with the assistance of AI, interdisciplinary capabilities will become a new competitive advantage, stating, "Intelligence itself is not the difference; applying intelligence is the difference." 他认为，在 AI 辅助下，跨学科能力将成为新的竞争优势，「智能本身不是差异，应用智能才是差异」。

Regarding organizational models, Kumar proposed drawing inspiration from the "Hollywood model," which involves rapidly forming teams around projects and disbanding them upon completion. He stated that enterprises can input accumulated knowledge into large language models to form long-term usable "agent capital," while human resources become flexible variables. 在组织模式上，Kumar 提出借鉴「好莱坞模式」，即围绕项目快速组建团队，完成后再解散。他表示，企业可将知识沉淀输入大语言模型，形成长期可用的「代理资本」，而人力则成为灵活的变量。

Furthermore, Kumar emphasized the importance of intuition in decision-making. He believes that leaders should act quickly by combining data and experience, stating, "When data covers 60% to 70%, one should revert to intuition to drive decisions, otherwise the opportunity will be missed." 此外，Kumar 强调决策中直觉的重要性。他认为，领导者应在数据与经验的结合下快速行动，「当数据覆盖 60% 至 70% 时，就应回到直觉推动决策，否则将错失时机」。

item.title: 一加 15 现身中国电信终端产品库
item.guid: 一加-15-现身中国电信终端产品库
item.description:
Yesterday, the OnePlus 15 appeared in China Telecom's terminal product database, with the model number "OPPO PLK110". The device is scheduled for official release today. 昨天，一加 15 已现身中国电信终端产品库，型号为「OPPO PLK110」。该机计划于今日正式发布。

The page shows that the OnePlus 15 offers five storage configurations, starting from 12GB + 256GB, with a maximum option of 16GB + 1TB. Color options include "Absolute Black," "Original Dune," and "Misty Purple." The retail price of the product has not yet been announced. 页面显示，一加 15 提供五种存储规格，12GB + 256GB 起步，最高可选 16GB+1TB，配色包括「绝对黑」「原色沙丘」「雾光紫」。产品零售价格尚未公布。

In terms of appearance, the OnePlus 15 features a 6.78-inch centered single punch-hole flat screen and flat edges. The bottom of the device houses a speaker grille, card slot, and USB-C port. It has a 32-megapixel front camera and a 50-megapixel triple rear camera setup. 外观方面，一加 15 配备 6.78 英寸居中单挖孔直屏与直角边框，机身底部设有扬声器开孔、卡槽及 USB-C 接口。前置镜头为 3200 万像素，后置为 5000 万像素三摄组合。

Regarding core specifications, the OnePlus 15 is equipped with the SM8850 (fifth-generation Snapdragon 8 Extreme Edition) processor. Its body dimensions are 161.42 × 76.67 × 8.18mm, and it weighs approximately 210g. The screen resolution is 2772 × 1272, and it supports USB 3.2 Gen1. The battery capacity reaches 7300mAh. 核心配置上，一加 15 搭载 SM8850（第五代骁龙 8 至尊版）处理器，机身尺寸为 161.42 × 76.67 × 8.18mm，重量约 210g。屏幕分辨率为 2772 × 1272，支持 USB 3.2 Gen1。电池容量达 7300mAh。

item.title: 宽体设计 + 大尾翼，腾势 Z 谍照曝光
item.guid: 宽体设计-+-大尾翼，腾势-Z-谍照曝光
item.description:
According to motor.es, Denza's first concept sports car, the "Denza Z," recently appeared at Germany's Nürburgring circuit for testing. The car features a wide-body design and a large rear wing, with its overall aerodynamic performance drawing significant attention. 据 motor.es 报道，腾势首款概念跑车「腾势 Z」日前现身德国纽博格林赛道进行测试。该车采用宽体设计，配备大型尾翼，整体空气动力学表现引人关注。

The report indicates that the new car's front fascia features double "L" and "V" shaped LED light strips. The front end is dominated by three large air intakes, with guide vanes on both sides, and an extended lower lip spoiler to enhance downforce. Three cooling vents are arranged on the wide wheel arches, covering giant brake discs clamped by large calipers. 报道指出，新车前脸搭载双「L」与「V」形 LED 灯条，车头由三个大型进气口主导，两侧设有导流槽，下唇延伸扰流板增强下压力。宽大轮拱上布置三个散热口，覆盖巨型刹车盘，并由大型卡钳夹持。

Additionally, the front hood opening is used to cool mechanical components on the axle, the side skirts are sharp, and air guide openings are present on and behind both front and rear wheel arches. The most striking design element is the massive rear wing, further highlighting its high-performance positioning. 此外，前机盖开口用于冷却轴上机械部件，车身侧裙锋利，前后轮拱及其后方均设有空气导流开口。最为醒目的设计是硕大的尾翼，进一步凸显其高性能定位。

Foreign media reports that the car's testing is expected to continue until next spring, indicating that Denza's R&D progress in the high-performance electric vehicle sector is accelerating. 外媒称，该车测试预计将持续至明年春季，显示腾势在高性能电动车领域的研发进度正在加快。

item.title: 美团发布新款 13.6B 视频生成模型
item.guid: 美团发布新款-13.6B-视频生成模型
item.description:
Yesterday, Meituan officially released its first video generation foundation model, LongCat-Video. The model boasts 13.6 billion parameters and is open-sourced under the MIT license. 昨天，美团正式发布其首个视频生成基础模型 LongCat-Video。该模型拥有 136 亿参数，并以 MIT 协议开源。

LongCat-Video supports three core tasks: Text-to-Video generation, Image-to-Video generation, and Video-Continuation. LongCat-Video 支持三类核心任务：文本生成视频（Text-to-Video）、图像生成视频（Image-to-Video）以及视频续写（Video-Continuation）。

Official data shows that the model can generate 720p, 30fps videos within minutes and achieve minute-long video generation, avoiding common color drift and quality degradation issues. 官方数据显示，该模型可在数分钟内生成 720p、30fps 的视频，并能实现分钟级长视频生成，避免常见的颜色漂移与质量下降问题。

Evaluation data shows that LongCat-Video approaches or surpasses some closed-source products in multiple metrics for text-to-video and image-to-video generation. Although its overall score is not entirely leading, as a 13.6 billion parameter dense model, its performance is already close to that of the 28 billion parameter MoE model Wan 2.2. 评测数据显示，LongCat-Video 在文本生成视频和图像生成视频的多项指标上接近或优于部分闭源产品。尽管整体分数未全面领先，但作为一个 136 亿参数的 dense 模型，其表现已接近 280 亿参数的 MoE 模型 Wan 2.2。

For installation and deployment, LongCat-Video offers a simplified process. Users can quickly obtain code and weights via the GitHub repository and support running multiple tasks with a single command. Meituan also provides a Streamlit-based visual interface, lowering the barrier to entry. 安装与部署方面，LongCat-Video 提供简化流程，用户可通过 GitHub 仓库快速获取代码与权重，并支持一行命令运行多种任务。美团还提供了基于 Streamlit 的可视化界面，降低了使用门槛。

🤗 Hugging Face: https://huggingface.co/meituan-longcat/LongCat-Video 🤗 Hugging Face: https://huggingface.co/meituan-longcat/LongCat-Video

item.title: 三星 Galaxy XR 支持直接安装 APK、解锁 bootloader
item.guid: 三星-Galaxy-XR-支持直接安装-APK、解锁-bootloader
item.description:
According to UploadVR, Samsung's newly released Galaxy XR headset supports direct installation of Android APKs on the device, without needing a computer connection or developer mode. 据 UploadVR 报道，三星最新发布的 Galaxy XR 头显支持直接在设备上安装 Android APK，无需连接电脑或开启开发者模式。

同时，该设备的引导加载程序（bootloader）可解锁，为用户提供更高的系统开放性。这使得搭载 Google Android XR 的 Galaxy XR 成为目前三大主流独立 XR 平台中最开放的一款。

相比之下，苹果 visionOS 完全不允许用户侧载应用，仅限开发者通过 Xcode 在 Mac 上编译测试；而 Meta 的 Horizon OS 虽然支持侧载，但需注册开发者账号并提供手机号或支付信息验证，且必须通过外部设备连接才能完成安装。

UploadVR 指出，在 Galaxy XR 上，用户只需通过内置浏览器（如 Chrome）下载 APK，并在「安全与隐私」设置中授权安装「未知应用」，即可完成安装。

此外，有开发者发现该设备的 bootloader 可解锁，理论上允许安装自定义操作系统。尽管目前尚无通用的独立 XR 系统，但这一开放性为未来的系统修改留下可能性。

item.title: 泡泡玛特携手孙燕姿推联名手办
item.guid: 泡泡玛特携手孙燕姿推联名手办
item.description:
据 SocialBeta 报道，泡泡玛特近日正式开启与华语歌手孙燕姿的联名手办发售。此次合作以旗下情绪 IP Hirono 小野为载体，主题为「向前走，坏天气终会放晴」，灵感源自孙燕姿歌曲《坏天气》。

该联名手办早在 8 月新加坡 PTS 展会亮相时便引发粉丝关注。此次公开发售的版本在细节上融入大量孙燕姿元素，包括《风衣》歌词意象、巡演舞美设计以及个人标志性符号。孙燕姿本人也在昨日发布开箱视频，逐一解读隐藏彩蛋。

值得注意的是，泡泡玛特并未选择旗下顶流 IP LABUBU，而是启用潜力 IP 小野。原因在于孙燕姿本人对该角色的喜爱，以及双方在情绪表达上的契合。小野以孤独与治愈为核心叙事，与孙燕姿音乐中关于困境与自我救赎的主题形成呼应。

此前，泡泡玛特已与周深、王嘉尔展开类似合作，均在市场上取得显著反响。

item.title: 「以租代买」成新潮流，年轻人消费观念加速转型
item.guid: 「以租代买」成新潮流，年轻人消费观念加速转型
item.description:
据《北京日报》报道，年轻消费者正加速拥抱「以租代买」的消费模式，从数码设备到婚庆布置，租赁正在成为新一代消费趋势。与传统「购买占有」不同，这一模式强调实际体验与成本优化，凸显共享经济在年轻群体中的渗透力。

数据显示，租赁需求在多个领域快速增长。美团平台统计显示，今年 8 月「相机租赁」搜索量同比增长 63%、「婚纱礼服租赁」增长 109%、「无人机租赁」增长 89%、「儿童推车租赁」增幅达 165%。芝麻租赁平台上半年交易额同比增长 71.6%，其中 30 岁以下用户占比超过六成，「00 后」订单量同比翻倍。

在实际应用场景中，CCD 相机、运动相机等成为旅游和社交场景的热门租赁品类。部分年轻人通过租赁先行体验，再决定是否购买，从而避免高额支出与资源浪费。婚庆、演唱会等非日常消费场景中，租赁同样展现出成本优势与便利性。

不过，行业仍存在纠纷与隐私风险。部分用户反映，租赁平台存在延迟发货、押金难退、损坏责任认定模糊等问题。同时，部分平台要求上传身份证照片、信用评分，引发个人信息安全担忧。

item.title: 贵价面包热潮：排队 5 小时，黄牛加价成产业链
item.guid: 贵价面包热潮：排队-5-小时，黄牛加价成产业链
item.description:
据 21 财经报道，随着咖啡、奶茶陷入 9.9 元低价竞争，贵价网红面包正悄然成为年轻消费者的新宠。记者昨日在北京 B&C 面包店走访发现，工作日仍有大量消费者排队，部分顾客为购买 35 元至 128 元不等的面包排队超过 5 小时。

报道指出，近年来高端烘焙品牌在一二线城市快速扩张，单品价格普遍在 30 元至 60 元区间，部分限量款甚至被黄牛加价至 300 元。二手平台上，代购面包的加价幅度在 30 元至 60 元之间，已形成完整产业链。

分析认为，贵价面包之所以能吸引年轻人，主要依靠四大策略：

  • 强调进口原料与手作工艺，凸显稀缺性；
  • 通过外语直译或自造词命名，营造「高级感」；
  • 采用限购与限量供应的饥饿营销；
  • 强化社交属性，消费者购买后往往先拍照打卡，再进行消费。

不过，行业数据显示，国内烘焙门店平均存活时长仅 32 个月，58% 的门店在 2 年内倒闭。高昂的租金、人工与原料成本，使得贵价烘焙店在扩张同时也面临较大生存压力。

item.title: 《怪奇物语》第五季大结局或将登陆院线
item.guid: 《怪奇物语》第五季大结局或将登陆院线
item.description:
According to TechRadar, Netflix has announced that the finale of "Stranger Things" Season 5 will be released simultaneously in cinemas and on streaming platforms, a global first. This episode will be released between December 31, 2025, and January 1, 2026, coinciding with its launch on the Netflix platform. 据 TechRadar 报道，Netflix 宣布将以全球首创的形式同步在影院和流媒体平台播出《怪奇物语》第五季大结局。这一集将于 2025 年 12 月 31 日至 2026 年 1 月 1 日期间上映，并与 Netflix 平台同步上线。

According to official information, the final episode of "Stranger Things" Season 5 will be available at 5 PM Pacific Time on December 31 in the US, midnight Greenwich Mean Time in the UK, and 10 AM Pacific Time on January 1 for Australian viewers. 根据官方信息，《怪奇物语》第五季的最后一集将在美国太平洋时间 12 月 31 日下午 5 点、英国格林威治标准时间午夜上线，澳大利亚观众则可于太平洋时间 1 月 1 日上午 10 点观看。

Concurrently, over 350 cinemas in the US and Canada will screen the episode simultaneously, while release plans for other countries and regions have not yet been announced. 同时，美国和加拿大超过 350 家影院将同步放映该集，其他国家和地区的上映计划尚未公布。

Previously, Netflix had rejected proposals to release the series in theaters, citing a lack of "dialogue, community, and sharing." However, as competitors found success with a dual theatrical and streaming model, Netflix ultimately chose to adjust its strategy. 此前，Netflix 曾否决过将该剧院线化的提议，理由是缺乏「对话、社区和分享」。然而，随着竞争对手在院线与流媒体的双轨模式上取得成功，Netflix 最终选择调整策略。

"Stranger Things" Season 5 will be released in two volumes, with the first volume set to launch on November 26, 2025, and the second volume on December 25. The simultaneous theatrical release of the finale is seen as a significant experiment for Netflix in its content distribution model. 《怪奇物语》第五季分为两卷播出，第一卷定于 2025 年 11 月 26 日上线，第二卷则将在 12 月 25 日发布。大结局的同步院线放映被视为 Netflix 在内容分发模式上的一次重要尝试。

item.title: 《洛杉矶劫案》预告发布，定档 2026 年 2 月北美上映
item.guid: 《洛杉矶劫案》预告发布，定档-2026-年-2-月北美上映
item.description:
The action-crime film "Los Angeles Heist" recently released its first trailer. Starring Chris Hemsworth and Halle Berry, the story focuses on a master jewel thief who, after planning his last heist, intends to retire but finds himself targeted by a meticulous detective. 动作犯罪片《洛杉矶劫案》近日发布首支预告片。影片由克里斯·海姆斯沃斯与哈莉·贝瑞主演，故事聚焦一名多年未失手的珠宝大盗，在计划最后一次行动后准备金盆洗手，却被一位缜密警探锁定。

The film is adapted from the original work by New York Times bestselling author Don Winslow, directed by Bart Layton, and features Monica Barbaro, Barry Keoghan, Mark Ruffalo, and Jennifer Jason Leigh, among others. The film is scheduled for release in North America on February 13, 2026. 该片改编自《纽约时报》畅销书作家唐·温斯洛原著，由巴特·雷顿执导，莫妮卡·巴巴罗、巴里·基奥恩、马克·鲁法洛及詹妮弗·杰森·李等参演。影片定档 2026 年 2 月 13 日北美上映。

Judging from its production lineup, "Los Angeles Heist" continues Hollywood's recent focus on high-concept crime thrillers, combining a bestselling literary IP with a star-studded cast, aiming to capture the North American market window before the Lunar New Year. 从制作阵容来看，《洛杉矶劫案》延续了近年来好莱坞对高概念犯罪题材的关注，结合畅销文学 IP 与明星卡司，意在抢占春节档前的北美市场窗口。

item.title: 《一对一：约翰与洋子》即将上线流媒
item.guid: 《一对一：约翰与洋子》即将上线流媒
item.description:
The John Lennon and Yoko Ono documentary "One to One: John and Yoko" will premiere on HBO Max on November 14. The film focuses on the 1972 "One to One" charity concert at Madison Square Garden in New York, which was their only collaborative concert and Lennon's only full-length concert after the Beatles disbanded. 约翰·列侬与小野洋子纪录片《一对一：约翰与洋子》将于 11 月 14 日上线 HBO Max。影片聚焦 1972 年纽约麦迪逊广场花园「One to One」慈善音乐会，这是两人唯一一次合作演唱会，也是列侬在披头士解散后唯一的全长演唱会。

Directed by Kevin Macdonald and Sam Rice-Edwards, the film includes previously unreleased home footage and audio, showcasing their relationship and public reactions. John Lennon and Yoko Ono's son, Sean Ono Lennon, remixed the original live music for the film, aiming to provide a higher fidelity experience on streaming platforms. 该片由凯文·麦克唐纳与 Sam Rice-Edwards 执导，包含此前未公开的生活影像与音频，呈现两人的关系及社会舆论反响。列侬与小野洋子的儿子 Sean Ono Lennon 为影片重新混音当年现场音乐，以期在流媒体平台上带来更高保真度的体验。

The film was released in cinemas in several locations earlier this year, and the streaming version will further expand its audience reach. 影片今年早些时候已在多地影院上映，流媒体版本将进一步扩大观众覆盖范围。
